attributes.action: Freeze Council Tax Payments for 6 Months Due to the COVID 19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: This will help people budget easier, as jobs are not guaranteed and many self employed are struggling and there will be an escalation of people dealing with their mental health, due to lack of income. Fund local authorities to freeze Council Tax.
attributes.background: All households are struggling to pay their mortgage, rent, bills and feed their families during this pandemic.  Council Tax is a huge bill, from income.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
